name: Path of Exile: The Fall of Oriath
description:
This is the next free update/expansion to the game Path of Exile.
This update will, among other improvements and additions, change the games main story and level progression. It will be changed from a 4 act story campaign being repeated over 3 difficulties to a single story campaign across 10 acts with new enemies and bosses in each area.

name: Black Mist
description:
Black Mist is a 2D, roguelike action game. 
 
All stages are covered by darkness, 
thus it is necessary to shoot shiny bullets to the darkness and move carefully. 
 
Bullets and your life are shared as "Energy", 
and the enemy's power and ferocity will be increase with the passage of time.

name: The Adventures of Capitano Navarro
description: A pirate on the sea of dreams navigates on a quest to save Verdefolhas, the fairy queen, from the terrible Buffoon, who seeks to create a chimerical empire in the oniric lands. However, in order to complete his mission, CAPITANO NAVARRO will need to face the challenges found in this psychedelic world!

name: Stripper Anya: Demon Slayer
description: It’s a normal day at the infamous strip club, "The TTT" and out of nowhere Anya has a life altering encounter with a real life demoness. Help Anya navigate new worlds and get back home!

name: Tauronos
description: Trapped inside an ancient labyrinth, chased by the mythical Minotaur. Will you reach the center? And if so, what will you discover about yourself there, in the dark?

name: Medieval Story
description: An action adventure game taking place in a medieval world. Venture down dark forests paths, explore damp caves and abandoned dungeons. Use your wits or fight your way to fame and fortune.

name: Vintage Hero
description:
Action, platforming, and everything you love about the 8-bit gaming era brought back to the modern world with a classic chip tune soundtrack and a gripping story. 
 
It's the year 198X... you know what to do.

name: Grav Grav Gravity
description: Use your own force of gravity to pass, seemingly impassable levels! This is a real hardcore for fans of difficult levels and true competition. You will go through each of these levels and prove to everyone what you can do?

name: Balloon Saga
description: Meet the new multiplayer shooter Balloon Saga. Fights of balloons in the Wild West, alien invaders, power-ups, various traps, lots of fascinating levels, and a bunch of rewards are waiting for you.

name: Fantasy Mosaics 18: Explore New Colors
description:
Uncle Aaron and the mysterious lady penguin go on a vacation trip to explore new colors for mosaic puzzles!     
  
Along the way they make new discoveries and build a fantasy landscape!     
  
Enjoy this installment of fantasy mosaics that also includes a new feature allowing you to view the background art with a puzzle image in progress.  
  
Follow the penguin family on this thrilling adventure that brings you new exciting challenges!

name: Slice&Dice
description: Slice & Dice is a puzzle game where the objective is to place the die in the goal frame. Using realistic physics, the player can move the die by affecting the cubes within the environment through a variety of actions like slicing and destroying them. It’s a party game that players and viewers alike can enjoy!

name: The Tavern
description:
Interactive as an RPG, complex as a visual novel, The Tavern uses a new approach to role-playing.
You play as mercenary named Nalia - a single mother who tries to earn enough coins to survive the winter. Your children need you to come back, but how are you going to act seeing the cruelty and rottenness of the outside world?

No fillers, no grinding, only your decisions and the story. All this takes place in a grim, dangerous fantasy world where the main goal of entire civilizations is survival.

name: The Shrouded Isle
description: The Shrouded Isle is a cult village management simulator. Your people look to you for leadership. Five families vie for power as the storms roll in and things beneath the waves threaten to wake. Feed and house your village while ensuring the ancient, dark traditions are followed and the appropriate sacrifices are made.

name: Klub '99
description: A Bouncer Simulation game inspired by Papers Please where you must check ID's at the door. Look out for Drunks, Underage drinkers, Fake or expired ID's!

name: Grim Tales: The White Lady - Collector's Edition
description: Your nephew and his friend have gone missing from Evergreen Boarding School! Your only lead is that both children recently mentioned seeing the apparition of a lady in white. Can you uncover the secrets hiding in the boarding school, or will you fall prey to the spirits inside?

name: Earthling Priorities
description:
Earthling Priorities is a subtle mini-adventure game, partly homaging those good ol' times when Space Quest happened and Big Brother was still considered a bad thing.

It is trying very hard to be pithy, but is mostly rather silly.

You'll point, click, solve at least one puzzle, and get to ponder the reality of your sci-fi existence; also, the importance of doors.

name: Armello: Deluxe Bundle
description:
Get all major Armello DLC in one place and at a special discount with the Armello - Deluxe Bundle!

Armello is a grand swashbuckling adventure that combines three styles of play; The deep tactics of card games with the rich strategy of table top board games, combined with a character role-playing system.

name: Train Simulator 2021: DB BR 642 DMU
description: Built to serve the quieter communities of Germany, the DB BR 642 upholds the high standard of comfort and reliability expected from the 'Desiro' family of multiple units. The BR 642 is ready for virtual service and is packed with advanced features.

name: The Great Ace Attorney 2: Resolve
description:
The Great Ace Attorney 2: Resolve is the eleventh installment of the Ace Attorney series of text adventure video games.
New gameplay mechanics introduced to the series include Dance of Deduction, in which Ryunosuke must deduce mistakes and oversights in Herlock's overboard logic and uncover new facts, and Summation Examination, in which players must point out discrepancies among jurors' arguments to make their defendant's case and ultimately secure a "Not Guilty" verdict.

name: Hollow Knight: Hidden Dreams
description: Hidden Dreams is the first of four free content packs for Hollow Knight.

name: The Sports Trivia Challenge
description: How well do you know your Sports Trivia? Choose from the most popular sports categories including Baseball, Basketball, Football, Hockey, General, Olympics, Sports Records, Tennis, and World Cup! Challenge yourself or have a sports trivia night with friends and family in Party Mode!

name: Strikers 1945 for Nintendo Switch
description:
A revolution broke out in shooting games in 1995. The Japanese brand "Psikyo" introduced a new enemy's attack, "Spread bullets" not seen before then, and the history of a new shooting game began.

If you are a shooting game fan, "Psikyo shooting" that everyone knows is revived! Shoot!

name: Grim Tales: The White Lady
description: Your nephew and his friend have gone missing from Evergreen Boarding School! Your only lead is that both children recently mentioned seeing the apparition of a lady in white. Can you uncover the secrets hiding in the boarding school, or will you fall prey to the spirits inside?

name: ACA Neo Geo: Aero Fighters 2
description: AERO FIGHTERS 2 is a vertical-scrolling shoot 'em up released in 1994 by VIDEO SYSTEM. A variety of unique pilots, including a pop singer and an aviation ninja, take place in dog fights at the speed of sound to save the world.

name: Flippy Knife
description: Flipy knives, toss axes, and throw legendary swords! Become a master while building your own collection of knives!

name: Dunk Hit
description:
Get on fire in this hot, epic and bouncy basketball game! 
Score as many point as you can before the time runs out!

name: Neo Angle
description: Retro inspired Minimal puzzle game.

name: Match and Crash
description: Match and Crash is a little 3-way-match puyyle arcade casual game that will test your fruit matching skill and ask you to clear all its stages.

name: Purpul Bandana
description: Well, there is only one character in this game and that is Blu's, Yello's and Grin's sister Purpul. Purpul is a ninja with a special training in mind - achieve perfect balance between black and white, yin and yang. This is exactly what your mission is going to be here - pass through all the stages and achieve perfect balance in each one.

name: Lost Items
description: You wake up lost in a maze and realize there are many items on the ground. They all seem high-valuable, so you decide to pick them all. But there are also many ghosts that don't really want you to pick the items. Not that they will try to kill you, but they'll steal and move the items...

name: Space Panic Arena
description:
Fight to survive in extraterrestrial environments while scavenging weapons and ammo. 
Defeat waves of enemies to earn money in order to upgrade your weapons in Horde Mode.

name: Raccoon Hero: Among the Cacti
description: Your goal in this game is to help the raccoon cubs escape their ball cages by matching their color with the color of the ball you throw at it. The babies are hidden among hundreds of other colorful balls. So basically, you need to destroy as much balls as necessary and achieve the certain score that is calculated for every level.

name: Rangi
description: Solve complex puzzles, explore hidden temples, escape deadly platforms and revel in the joy of flight as you restore the Musiki's stolen rhythms!

name: SpaceBound
description:
SpaceBound is a brutally challenging puzzle-platformer, set in a zero-gravity environment. Stranded and bound by their oxygen tether, two astronauts must work together to make it out alive.
Go in alone, or team up and face the unknown.

name: Star Tap
description:
"How far is a lifetime?"
"Does a journey have meaning if you don't remember it?"
"What is the strongest force that keeps you going on forever?"

Star Tap is an idle space clicker where you follow Stella’s journey through the solar system and beyond, to travel where no human has been before. Go on the journey of a lifetime to planets, the brightest star in each constellation, Messier Objects and more!

name: Puzzle Adventure Blockle
description: A puzzle game.

name: The baron got you again
description: In The baron got you again you play as a secret agent, prisonner from a cell in the middle of Argentina, inside the secret base of the vile Baron Von Rimmel. Your mission : escape, and as fast as possible. Search the different rooms to discover the bunker's exit without being noticed.

name: Run For Coins
description: The objective of the game is to find all the coins and kill all the enemies, take the key and advance to the next map before the time finishes. Finish the map and make your best score.

name: Weaves of Fate
description: Weaves of Fate is a unique and epic blend of isometric role playing and tactical strategy. In the far future, a demonic invasion throughout all of time has been triggered as a result of humanity's actions. With the timeline shattered and paradoxes cropping up, the game follows multiple characters in different time periods as they deal with the resulting challenges and conflicts. As fate's weaves fall apart and the timeline fractures, the incarnations of reality decide to intervene. To preserve fate and destiny, Death himself must become mortal and enter the human realm to fix things.

name: Flight of Light
description: Rhythm-racing - Fly through fantastical worlds, or race your friends in time to the music!

name: Interplanetary Hunter
description: The whole Galaxy is occupied by the outlanders. Now we need you to drive your mecha to eliminate the invaders on the space stations and the planets. Collect the booty and upgrade your equipments.

name: Staff Wars: Wizard Rumble
description: Staff Wars: Wizard Rumble is a fast-paced multiplayer game where players compete atop a collapsing battlefield to be the last wizard standing. Blast your foes into the void below and claim the title of the ultimate wizard!

name: WakeUp!
description:
WakeUp! is a casual rouge-like game placed in a fantasy, dream world, where the goal is to escape and save yourself. 
 
The game generates an infinite, procedurally generated world. You must gather resources and manage your inventory to survive. Look for hints where to find the exit!

name: Bug Killers
description: Bug Killers – is a dynamic Top Down shooter where you will need to turn crowds of bugs-mutants into meat. The game has three modes: Survival, PvP and PvE. Different types of armament will help you to effectively destroy the enemies.

name: Slash Arena: Online
description:
Massively multiplayer online battles with swords and axes.
Simple arcade action! Dodge the attack and choose a perfect time to strike.
Upgrade your weapon, slash enemies, collect resources and reach the top!

name: Mind Shift
description:
The position shifting puzzle game with more than 100 levels.
Embody your mind by creating your own puzzles and test your skills by mastering even the hardest of our creations.

name: The Slug
description: The Slug - is of medium complexity 2D platformer where you play as an ordinary slug. Your main objective is picking up the mucus and thereby completing levels. Be careful, each level has different dangers lurk, such as mosquitoes, ants and sharp peaks. Faced with them your main character instantly dies, respectively, the level starts over. Jumping on ants, you without harm to yourself kill them, it will help you pass the levels without unnecessary enemies. Think over every step, because if you step on the wrong platform, you can't come back.

name: The Unreal Journey of Mongol
description: The game is Cartoon low-poly scenes. Each scene has its own characteristics, including different match colors and various object models.Six vivid scenes respectively corresponded to six different gameplay. There are actions, decryption and puzzles, to pass the level. Green prairie, Purple forest, Blue island, Blue island, Yellow desert, Black ruins, White glacier. I hope you like the game, thank you.

name: Fish for gold
description: In this game you will be in the place of a hunter of fish in the ocean. You need to catch all the fish, for each of which you will be given money. But be careful! In addition to harmless fish, there are dangerous sharks and octopuses.

name: Dark Elf
description:
It’s a story about a dark elf and a teenager who survived from death field after experiencing countless death. 
The background is that after the war and in the peaceful world, Frelia the former mercenary saved the young Ruse who was attacked, and took him in.

name: Deltaplan Simulator
description: Deltaplan Simulator is an adventure game in which you need to perform a variety of tricks and tasks flying on a hang-glider.

name: Wiloo
description: Help Wiloo to rescue his buddy in this adventure 2D side scrolling platformer with gameplay inspired mainly by 8/16 bit era platformers and updated graphics and sounds.

name: Cash Crop
description: The Delightfully Fun Cannabis Farming Game! Stake your claim in the lush Pacific Northwest as you and your quirky crew grow wicked buds, master the art and science of cannabis cultivation, breed new custom strains, expand to new markets, and flirt with law enforcement.

name: VTOL VR
description: VTOL VR is a near-futuristic combat flight game built specifically for Virtual Reality. Pilot advanced multi-role jets, using your hands to flip switches, press buttons, and manipulate the virtual flight controls. Take on a wide array of challenges that will put your flight skills, situational awareness, and combat tactics to the test.

name: This Merchant Life
description: This Merchant Life is a trading strategy game set in the troubled medieval kingdom of Peregrine. Turn a rickety wooden cart, two horses and a few coins into a thriving entrepreneurial triumph!

name: Tank Battle: Pacific
description: Capture the experience of being a tank commander in the Pacific Theatre in World War Two. Fight battles between Japan, France, China, Russia, British Commonwealth and The United States of America. The game has a wide range of features from the tank battles of Northern Manchuria to the battlefields of Burma and the landings on the Pacific Islands. The game even includes a what-if scenario for Operation Olympic, the invasion of the Japanese homelands.

name: Game of Dragons
description:
▶A RPG strategy card game, you can create card focused on your Hero’s adventure and its party.  
▶Construct and manage your own deck of cards as your cards are essential to the gameplay. 
▶Deeply rooted and originated from core RPGs and strategic fantasy elements not only from old age games like Ultima, Final Fantasy Series but to modern gaming trends as well.

name: Sunrise survival
description: "Sunrise" - is an online first-person shooter. Your task is to survive in the hard conditions of a post-apocalyptic world. Explore new regions, unite with other players to survive with them and create their own rules of survival!

name: Age of Gladiators II
description: Age of Gladiators II is a single-player strategy game set in the futuristic 3000AD, during the rebirth of the violent and hyper-competitive gladiatorial games. Manage your franchise while forging the attributes and abilities of your warriors. Build your story. Build your empire.

name: Community Inc
description: As a new Manager, build a happy community and trade with other races... for profit. Yes, that's right, we need their happiness so we can power up our portals. The Lings, your workers, will obey you and help you with your village. But beware, they can cause a lot of problems too. If this is not enough, there are other creatures that will try to do the same, they can trade, fight or help you. Oh, don't forget about the weather and some unexpected events. Welcome to Community INC!

name: Juanito Arcade Mayhem
description: Juanito Arcade Mayhem revives all the retro classics using the mechanics made popular by Super Pang. Don your finest pyjamas and help Juanito defend our favorite games from the alien Clonocell invasion!

name: Abstract Arena
description: Abstract Arena is a top-down action-shooter game set in a completely abstract context. Up to 6 different ships can clash in the Arena, taking advantage of all of the unique and balanced skills each of them owns. Fast, precise, powerful: the gameplay is easy to learn but hard to master, adaptable to many play styles thanks to the variety of situations the player is brought to encounter.

name: The Braves & Bows
description: The Braves & Bows is adventure platformer game in the open world. Here you can explore the castle and it's surroundings, placed on island that disconnected from other world. You should use a bow to fight with enemies that settled in the castle.

name: An Oath to the Stars
description:
Left for dead by her closest friend and comrade, Hoshiko is now looking for revenge. 
Follow her in this modern hardcore danmaku SHMUP about revenge, friendship and honour.

name: My Devil Lovers
description: You are the heroine! You take on the role of the heroine and experience romancing with handsome devils!

name: Bootleg Krew
description: Pirate bootleg roms as part of a 90s cracking group organised on IRC!

name: Songbirds: Creative Gaming
description:
Create music, compose melodies, and craft soundscapes in Songbirds - a playful musical game for people of all ages and musical abilities. Relax in a calming, creative experience as you explore the sounds of the Songbirds in three unique musical environments:
• The Sky - Draw across the night sky and these birds will create beautiful melodies. Use all four tempos to build up complex polyrhythmic patterns.
• The Lake - These birds create sound as they dive into the water. Take control of their timing to compose intricate, calming melodies.
• The Flock - Guide the flock to craft soaring meditative soundscapes. Use the moons to build up compositional layers and harmonies.
Peace.

name: Blaster Master Zero: EX Character - Shovel Knight
description: This unlocks the EX Character "Shovel Knight."

name: 雀姬
description:
Friend battle casual game "Quieji Mahjong", a 2D Mahjong mobile game that can be developed!
New users who log in will receive 10 consecutive bonuses! Completing the Novice Queshi mission will provide you with other massive rewards!

There are also popular Japanese voice actors Tomokazu Sugita and Rina Sato leading the dubbing, as well as multiple personalized decorations - rings, manicures, tablecloths and card backs can be chosen as you like~ No matter you win or lose, playing cards must be gorgeous, come and create your own exclusive style!

name: Fernz Gate
description: Travel to the other side and beyond and find a way back home in a fantasy RPG!

name: Tiny Defense 2
description: The army of evil Machines is back. The Minirobots need your help once again. Welcome to Tiny Defense 2! Tiny Defense 2 is a whole new level of the cutting-edge and charming gameplay in the sequel to the original title that hit millions of people. Now it's back with newly enhanced gameplay, cartoon-style graphics, and tons of new content. Take command of the Minirobot forces and defend the planet against hordes of brutal Machines!

name: Fungoids: Steam Version
description: Fungoids is a classic styled, retro themed plant bomber, inspired by the games of the 1980's. Play in 2 modes, Classic, for the original experience, or Alpha for extended game play.

name: Parkour Flight
Der einzig wahre Auserwählte
description: A Role-Playing game for PC.

name: Miracle Merchant
description: Combine ingredient cards to create potions and satisfy customer requests.

name: Operation Sheep Defense
description: Operation Sheep Defense is a fast paced tower defense game. Featuring dynamic levels and intelligent enemy behavior. Shape the enemy path or defend maze-like levels. Levels are short and intense.

name: FusionFall Retro
description: FusionFall Retro (abbreviated as Retro or FFR) was an unofficial revival of the Cartoon Network MMORPG FusionFall, which was crafted and supported over the span of four years by a team of devoted fans. The game was a modified version of the original game, with new custom content added later in its life.

name: Retne
description: In Retne you are a tourist traveling through VR Land. There's lots to see and so many things to do, but there's a catch; it's A DIY tour, so you have to do the hard work to visit all the magical attractions that the VR world has to offer.

name: Interplanetary: Enhanced Edition
description: In this turn-based strategic artillery game, players wage interplanetary wars by developing their home planets and firing massive barrages through the unpredictable gravity fields of the solar system.

name: Dash Dash Run!
description: Dash Dash Run! The frantic VR arcade runner that has you pumping those arms, performing to the crowd, and racing at crazy speeds across a wild selection of vibrant courses.

name: Run Crabby Run
description: Run Crabby Run is an adventure game and a lot of fun for the whole family. You can play by yourself, navigating the naughty Crabby, or with the use of the ”common screen” mode you can be accompanied by Octopus.

name: Fable Rush
description: Without donate and colorful match3 with exciting plot!

name: Tiny Town VR
description: Build a world filled with buildings, roads, vehicles and more. Give it life with posable characters. Tell a story with custom speech bubbles and in-game photo captures. Then, share those moments with your friends.

name: Hold My Beer
description:
This is a ridiculous game where you play the role of an idiot, doing idiotic dares and stunts. 
I don't recommend trying this at home, but since we'll be doing it in virtual reality, go right ahead!

name: Inescapable VR: Underground
description: A mysterious villain has locked you in an old basement and given you a simple task: to escape by completing the series of puzzles set before you. With a bomb timer set for one hour, can you discover the inner workings of the game and complete the challenges in time, or is your fate inescapable?

name: Alchemyland
description: What happens if you mix the root of the mandrake with the bear's claw? And the foot of the stalk with the crown of the royal mushroom? What hides the Orc in the trunk and why does not the Elf want to see the guests? Alchemland is a magical country in which everything is possible.

name: Clothesline Carnage
description: Clothesline Carnage is a multiplayer arcade fighting game with modes like Sumo, Volleyball, and Hacky Sack.

name: Gaia 2200
description: In 2200, the earth has been badly destroyed due to the human beings “Gaia Project ”,the first project which named by all the human beings to protect the earth, has been put on the agenda. Coincidentally, you have been the captain of “Gaia Project ”, now fight with your partners to save the world.

name: Descent: Silence of Mind
description: Hypnosis, memories, delusions and a disturbing secret revolve around silence of mind.

name: Undertaker's
description: Inspired by the economy simulation games oft the mid 90s, Afterlife 2 let's you manage your very own funeral home.

name: Saurian
description: Saurian is a video game project focused on living as a dinosaur in a dynamic open world through intense, survival-based gameplay.

name: Tacoma
description: Tacoma is a sci-fi narrative adventure set aboard a high-tech space station in the year 2088. Explore every detail of how the station's crew lived and worked, finding the clues that add up to a gripping story of trust, fear, and resolve in the face of disaster.

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Zootopia Defence 2: Hunt For Justice
description: The sequel to Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Zootopia Defence, set after Dual Destinies, focusing more on Apollo and Athena.

name: Space Junk Scavenger
description: Repair your spaceship by salvaging parts off shipwrecks nearby.

name: Didnapper
description:
Didnapper is a non-profit fan RPG Maker game originally developed by Wychkith for the ADIDAS Message Boards as a fun little curiosity before it became a full game after developer Kendrian became lead developer in 2012.

The story revolves around a princess from a unnamed fantasy kingdom named Suki who, after being betrayed by her cousin Cherisa who wanted to inherit the throne instead of her, is given the choice to join the Kidnapping Guild that held her captive in exchange of not being bound and gagged in a cell and to discover why Cherisa betrayed her.

As a kidnapper, she is tasked to kidnap girls for ransom while her guild searches for information on her cousin's whereabouts.

name: The Long Dark: Wintermute
description: The episodic story-mode for The Long Dark, WINTERMUTE, includes four of the five episodes that form WINTERMUTE. Episode Five is in development, and is slated for a late 2023 release. This will bring the WINTERMUTE storyline to its conclusion.

name: Quake: Func Jam 9
description: Func Map Jam #9 - a community project at Func_Msgboard. This pack features 15 Contract Revoked / Knave-themed levels of varying sizes. It comes with a start map and many custom models, sounds, and skyboxes. The map sources are included.

name: Fallen London: The Attendants
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for August, 2017. Third and final entry in the Season of Ruins.

name: Disc Golf to Go
description:
Grab your discs and let's hit the course! Disc Golf To Go has all of the fun and strategy of real disc golf adapted perfectly to the iPhone and iPad.
Each level is a bite-sized, disc golf puzzle. Avoid trees, traps and others hazards as you plan each shot, choose the right disc, and go for the basket!

name: Taps: Beautifully Simple
description: Open your mind to the simplicity of Taps and discover the ever growing challenge that awaits.

name: Flow Free: Warps
description:
Warps: Discover a new dimension of Flow Free!

Warp paths across the board in this challenging new Flow Free game.

Connect matching colors with pipe to create a Flow. Pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle. But watch out, pipes will break if they cross or overlap!

Free play through hundreds of levels, or race against the clock in Time Trial mode. Gameplay ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic, and everywhere in between. How you play is up to you. So, give Flow Free: Warps a try, and experience "mind like water"!

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Macro
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition: Farm Strips Vol 3 - South West England & Wales
description: Return to grassroots flying in the UK with Farm Strips Volume 3: South West England & Wales. This scenery pack is a collection of 18 airstrips recreating the small airfields often used by microlights and ultralights across South West England and Wales.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - McDonnell Douglas DC-3
description: The DC-3 was the aircraft that manufacturers wanted to replace with something better and more modern, but it performed so well that a viable replacement wasn't easy to make - hence the saying, “The only aircraft to replace a DC-3 is another DC-3.”

name: Mitrasphere
description: Co-op multiplayer j-rpg

name: Engolasters January 2021
description: The events depicted in this game are based in a real incident that will happen in January 2021 near the small mountain town of Engolasters, Andorra.

name: A Moth Batters Against Glass
description: This short narrative exploration game introduces you to a run down, abandoned city and the bookselling bug that once lived there. The city has changed in your absence, however, and it bears the mark of the being known as Walking-Weaver...

name: The Moth Oracle's Poem
description: A poetry mediation on appreciation of all things.

name: Shining Stars 3: Sanctuary of the Star Comet
description: Shining Stars 3: Sanctuary of the Star Comet is a ROM-Hack made by pieordie1, and is the third installment in the Shining Stars series.

name: Yo! Noid 2
description: Game jam developed "sequel" to Yo! Noid.

name: Beat Fever: Music Planet
description: Tap to the beat of the biggest songs from Nicki Minaj, Sia, Daddy Yankee, Marshmello, Lady Gaga, Beethoven and hundreds more! Beat Fever is the ultimate music game featuring top hits from pop, rock, EDM, classical, latin, hip-hop and more! Play the top hits in the world like Despacito, Super Bass, Uptown Funk, Poker Face, Happy and Beethoven’s 5th! Discover new music added EVERY MONTH from tomorrow’s biggest singers, bands, DJs, composers, and rappers.

name: DrawFighters
description: DrawFighters is a turn-based combat game that lets players draw their own fighters and import them into the game as 3D characters using the companion mobile app.

name: Battlefield 1: Revolution
description:
Join the Battlefield community in the dawn of all-out war. Untold chapters of World War 1 are brought to life with unmatched intensity through an included Battlefield 1 Premium Pass and an unmatched Battlefield 1 experience.

Battlefield 1 Revolution lets you jump into The Great War through massive team-based multiplayer battles. With unique combat roles on land, in the sky, and at sea, no battle is ever the same. Or discover a world at war through single player War Stories campaigns.

Progress in deep and rewarding Service Assignments, then customize your solider to match your playstyle with Specializations. Take on fan-favorite modes like Conquest and Frontlines, volunteer for multi-battle challenges in Operations, or squad up with friends in Platoons.

Join the ranks of the revolution and experience war on an epic scale.

name: an Orc's Tale: Kriegsruf
description:
Die Geschichte eines jungen Orks in den Wirren eines Krieges, der zu gross für einen einzelnen Krieger ist.
Storylastiges RPG im Stil der alten Klassiker, mit modernen Mitteln dargestellt, ohne den alten Charme zu verlieren
mit etlichen handgestalteten Grafiken und Effekten.

name: Snake 3D Adventures
description: Classic arcade gameplay? Check! Cute graphics? Check! Fun puzzles and tough enemies? Check! So what are you waiting for? Get it now and scratch that nostalgia itch!

name: SoulFrost
description: This is a short but hard minimalistic scroll shooter where you race against doing too many actions to keep more energy, without which you won't make it to the end. Lightweight narrative art-game.

name: Monoposto
description: Monoposto is an amazing independent racing game with single-seater open-wheel cars.

name: Pigeon Wings
description: A mysterious aeronautics titan is bent on destroying East Megalopolis and Pigeon's the only bird who can stop him. Join General Exposition, battle the devious pilot XO-9999, and prove that Pigeon ain't no chicken nugget!vRace, shoot and boost your way through 50 levels of crushing speed.

name: Battle Pixel's Survival
description: Battle Pixel's Survival is a fast paced multiplayer unknown battle ground arena where you have to do anything possible and impossible to stay alive and survive!

name: Kleptocrat
description: Kleptocrat is a unique game of strategy and tactics, based on patterns of money laundering and offshore structuring that have been used by corrupt public officials... that is, until they got caught.

name: Little Alchemy 2
description:
Little Alchemy, the crafting game enjoyed by millions of players, is back with more items, fresh, new art style and charming music!

Mix items and create the world from scratch! Discover exciting items accompanied by funny descriptions and lose yourself exploring the huge, new library!

name: Mountaineer
description: Welcome to the mountain, where everything was peaceful until a storm appeared which caused a plane to crash. Play as Jack, a professional mountaineer who helps saving the few survivors from the crash. Protect them from cold, predators, hunger. can you save them all?

name: Surface: Game of Gods - Collector's Edition
description: Save your friends and escape from a deadly game!

name: Awakening: The Goblin Kingdom - Collector's Edition
description: After overcoming the Dreamless Castle and Moonfell Wood, you have come to the rugged, mountainous snow-peaked Goblin Kingdom!

name: Cats Tanks
description: Tanks game - which will make you remember the past and help test new feelings. To all fans of classical tanks - dedicated. Protect your headquarters from a variety of enemies.

name: Raccoon Hero: The Frost
description: Your goal in this game is to help the raccoon cubs escape their ball cages by matching their color with the color of the ball you throw at it. The babies are hidden among hundreds of other colorful balls. So basically, you need to destroy as much balls as necessary and achieve the certain score that is calculated for every level.

name: Better Off Tread
description: Better Off Tread is a nonstop arena combat game with up to twelve players squaring off against each other using a collection of unusual – and often comical – armored vehicles.

name: Dogcoin
description: You have to take on the role of a travel dog. Help him collect all the gold coins, crystals, sometimes snacking on delicious cookies!

name: CastleStorm VR
description: Catapult yourself onto the battlefield like never before in CastleStorm VR, an exciting new take on the tower-defense action-RPG phenomenon! Pit knights, soldiers, archers and even griffins against formidable foes in full VR castle vs. castle combat. See, feel and hear every arrow, battle cry and ballista shot on the battlefield, and get medieval in a whole new way with CastleStorm VR!

name: PowBall Renaissance
description: Brick breaking retro action hardcore Breakout fans will love. No distracting 3D backgrounds, gimmicks, or pointless storyline. Just pure smooth gameplay, 3 player mode, weapons, ammunition, store, galaxians and asteroids sub-games, many mysterious powerups, over 240 levels, and much more.

name: Comedy Night
description: Do you have the talent to face off against other comedians in a live comedy show contest. See how your material holds up in the face of brutal audience members who can vote you off or the relentless smack talk from other performers.

name: Galaxy of Drones
description: In GoD you control a small colonizing expedition lead by your appointed captain. As you delve deeper and deeper into the unknown of star systems to harvest the most valuable minerals in space, you soon find yourself on hostile waters.

name: MokMok
description: MokMok is a musical adventure. A unique experience set in a bizarre world, inhabited by Mok´s - living musical instruments. Take part in a funky adventure and discover interactive tunes.

name: A Mazeing Tower Defense
description: A traditional mazeing tower defense game with a fresh twist that'll have you playing for hours on end!

name: Animal Herding
description: Animal Herding is a stressful multitasking game where you require quick thinking and quick reflexes in an attempt to both keep animals from escaping and put up a new fence to finish the level.

name: Xenia
description: Classic pixel art platformer with simple controls. A beautiful game based on real facts.

name: Fapic
description:
An epic based on an inspiration. 
my first game.

name: Aliens&Asteroids
description: Inspired by the classic arcade game "Asteroids" Aliens & Asteroids active and fast space shoot 'em up with a lot of different enemies and bosses. Abilities, active Items and Upgrades guarantee a different experience every time.

name: Heroes of Civilizations
description: Strategy based cardgame, themed in ancient civilizations culture, wars and mythology. Fight in intense battles against other civilizations.

name: Sango Guardian Chaos Generation Steamedition
description: Sango Guardian Chaos Generation Steamedition is a fighting game,Most of the characters and scenes are designed with Chinese elements,Random selection of 9 scenes,Rich comboes challenge you.Fight with your friends!

name: The Ranger: Lost Tribe
description:
The story happens on the mainland of Roland. As a ranger, you have witnessed a series of anomalies rencently: the blood moon, mad animals... 
Now the elder chief of NaBaer expects you to suppress the mobs who plundered their tribe. 
Perhaps you can find some clues in the tribe seized by the mobs.

name: Insert Paper
description: You don't know who or where you are. The papers are there and the computers are asking you to insert paper. Your job here is simple: arrange the documents considering the information required by the reader machines.

name: Expanse
description: Expanse is a a top down shooter for up to 4 players which is set in outer space. Explore the Expanse while fighting swarms of enemies, dodging crazy amounts of bullets and battling cool unique bosses.

name: Delude - Succubus Prison
description:
The game has a seal for people over 18 years old.
DELUDE is Studio Halissoni newest work. DELUDE is a game with an engaging and mysterious story. In this game you are in the shoes of Luz D and need to find the exit of the succubus prison.

name: Breaking Good
description:
1 puzzle, 4 views. Grab your test tubes and enter the lab to solve a unique puzzle game based on chemical compounds. 
 
Match the chemical elements to achieve more than 900 different compounds and see how far you can go. 
Do you have what it takes?

name: Ameline and the Ultimate Burger
description:
The king was cursed, and won't eat anything! Bring him the Ultimate Burger and revive his appetite...
but beware, the power of the Ultimate Burger will make the whole kingdom drool, defend it with your needles!

name: Res Judicata: Vale of Myth
description: It all started with a drunken bet - kill the Culebre and make a sack of gold. After being swindled out of the prize money, things got heated fast. Now Garbhan, a Scottish Highlander, and Francis, a bard notorious for his inability to sing, reluctantly depart on a journey together...

name: Asteroids Millennium
description: A modern spin on an old classic! Asteroids Millennium provides exciting new game play without departing from the feel of its predecessors. Collect power-ups, dodge threats, and blast away at asteroids and enemies alike in this survival game that is truly fun to play.

name: Lemuria: Lost in Space - VR Edition
description: Lemuria: Lost in Space is a unique adventure, full of mysteries, puzzles and shocking discoveries. It's a combination of point 'n click adventure, RPG and survival game.

name: Hyper Drive: The Insane Gravity Race
description: Hyper Drive - The Insane Gravity Race - probably the fastest and most insane racing game you will ever play.

name: Dark and Bright
description: Enjoy a different type of Indie-RPG! Grouchweasel is about to get lost in a place that combines reality and dream. What is this world and how did he get here? Can you help him overcome an abstract world that is on the edge of reality?

name: The Brave Mouse
description:
To pass the level you need to build the correct sequence of transitions on the platforms. A wrong step can lead to your downfall, followed by a restart of the level. After collecting all 3 pieces of cheese on the level opens the door, passing through which you get to the next level. 
And remember - free cheese is only in a mousetrap.

name: Brain Machine
description: This is a stealth puzzle game with amazing mechanics on magic cube, and also an extraordinary story line. You will hide, think, find and collect. You will feel sorrow, fear, tension, happiness and desperation. Take them down and find the truth!

name: Gotta Go
description: With pressure mounting, the clock ticking, and only a vague idea where the bathroom is, players must avoid co-workers’ inane blathering and HR’s unwavering gaze as they make their way across the office to find their porcelain sanctuary.

name: Angel Flare
description: Angel Flare is a new approach to aerial shoot’em ups. We have created a shooter, but we also added minor RPG elements, such as pilots that affect the Plane controls, different types of planes each with varying attributes, unique upgrades for you plane, weapons and wingmen. Yes, in AngelFlare, you can have wingmen that help you fight, protect you, or collect items for you. Even these wingmen have upgrades! Angel Flare is all about customization, with hundreds of possible loadouts!

name: Arena
description: "Multiplayer deathmatch games with drones! Enjoy fast multiplayer action with your drone in Deathmatch and Team Deathmatch competitions in exotic arenas." Arena supports playing both with and without VR.

name: Zombie Town
description: Well the world finally ended. Zombies rule the planet. Your plan to survive alone hasn't been going so well. Desperate, you use an old radio to ask for help. How about that? Somebody is answering your call!

name: Astoria: The Holders of Power Saga
description: Astoria: The Holders of Power Saga is a charming 35+hr RPG with an epic, twisting story, containing intricate characters and cinematic cutscenes. done in classic 90's, RPG-style storytelling.

name: Ghosts of Miami
description: Miami, 1986. Chelo Martínez has started a private investigation business to find missing people. Make tough decisions, solve cases, and find love: but you might not have time for all three.

name: Solenars Edge Rebirth
description: Three lost orphans band together to set out on a journey that transcends the boundaries of imagination and retrieve the pieces of a legendary gem, all while keeping the darkness at bay alongside a colorful cast of unique characters.

name: In the Dark
description:
Pain....
Darkness...

Alone, A man wakes, no proof of his identity, except for fragments of memory in a muddled mind.

Danger...
Destruction...

Help Me...

name: Noise
description: The USSR era is coming to its end – it is 1988. The radio amateur catches a strange signal that emits incomprehensible noises. It is broadcast around the clock and only sometimes a human voice makes its way through the air. You will have to uncover terrifying secrets about this enigmatic signal.

name: The Monster Inside
description: A film noir style audio-visual novella. A mysterious woman... a string of murders... and a man with a hidden past.

name: Maggie's Apartment
description: Locked in her one-room apartment, Maggie Mallowne must uncover the mysterious celebrity conspiracies of the outside world by talking to her neighbors through her apartment walls

name: Crusader Crash
description:
Inspired by great titles such as Ghosts 'n Goblins and Mega Man 2 comes Crusader Crash! 
A fast paced, challenging, side-scrolling game with retro art and soundtracks! 
Play through 8 vastly different stages each with their own boss that will put your skills to the test!

name: The Voice in the Void
description: Travel to the mysterious Land of the Dead and encounter a variety of crazy characters and terrifying monsters in this hilariously bizarre comedy RPG with an engaging timing-based combat system.

name: Underdone
description:
Underdone is a RPG game involved around completing quests, grinding mobs, collecting loot and levelling up. 
You can also maintain a garden then plant many types of fruit, vegetables, flowers and trees for you to harvest later which can be used as item or for crafting recipes. 
When you don't feel like doing any of the above you can also enjoy a nice day fishing and try and get that big one!

name: Deadliners
description: When friends battle it out in the Deadliners arena, who can survive and come out on top?

name: Medieval Mystery Match
description: Enjoy this medieval themed fantasy match 3 game. Play in a variety of environments and travel this fantasy world as you match your way through 100 levels. Earn gold along the way that can earn you bonuses and extra special symbols to help you progress through the harder levels. Watch for hints and learn tricks to master each level with the highest score possible. Replay levels to earn new high scores. With more than 20 hours of gameplay content including a timed and relaxed mode, you'll be certain to enjoy this game for a long time.

name: Obscura
description: A new reality of fear. What you see may follow into your dreams, that will soon turn into nightmares.

name: Firewood
description:
Firewood is a 2D adventure game with psychological horror elements. 
 
The game tells the story of an old man who has lost his wife years ago and is still having troubles with his past.

name: The Nose
description: This is a story-driven experience adapted from one of the Gogol's story. It has, in addition to the main story, several side stories and missions.

name: Z ViRus: V.I.R.M Uprising
description: A virus outbreak has spread across the galaxy infecting all human life. It appears to have originated from an unknown species that scientists found and kept classified. Explore various locations such as planets and ships. Fight off hoards and acquire intel scientists documented but didn't live to finish. Level up your classes to acquire additional assets for your loadout! You are the galaxy's last hope to end the virus before it reaches Earth.

name: The Initiate
description: The Initiate is a mystery puzzle game with horror elements. This is your trial; complete it, or die!

name: Skeleton Boomerang
description: Skeleton Boomerang is a platformer where the hero, Hunter, must use an enchanted boomerang to put an end to an army of bony soldiers led by the voodoo master Mr. Saturday. Get high scores, collect upgrades, find secrets, and overcome many skeletal challenges!

name: Shoot 'm Up
description:
Tactical multiplayer chaos. 
Thats what would describe this game in 3 words. Its fast, its messy, its challenging. Do you like blowing up zombies to bits together with your friends? Protecting your base from the enemy team? Grab your gear and start the chaos!

name: Supreme Ruler the Great War
description: Real-Time Strategy/Wargame. BattleGoat Studios invites you to travel back to 1914 and select from more than 50 playable regions at the onset of World War I, as European powers struggle to survive and new technologies transform warfare.

name: Fidel: Dungeon Rescue
description: Fidel is a small roguelike game about finding the best path through monsters, treasure and magic. Each match is only a couple minutes long, but there's many surprises and tricks to learn each time. Also, you are a dog.

name: WarpBall
description: Football with a futuristic twist, WarpBall lets players teleport around the pitch for unrivaled mobility.  Taking sports to the next level

name: MetaWorld
description: MetaWorld® invites you explore a persistent 10,000 square mile, massively scaled open world together. Discover endless activities and adventure, inside a real-time physics simulation allowing thousands of visitors to participate simultaneously online.

name: Life of a caveman
description:
Live the colorful life of a caveman.   
Eat and interact with other cavemen in order to grow stronger and smarter.   
Once you are strong enough, become the leader of your group and guide them to safety;   
safety from things like the the beast that attacks at night and the other tribe that left tracks in your area.

name: A Step Into Darkness
description:
A Step Into Darkness is a indie horror game in which you play as a journalist desperate to redeem himself after he makes the biggest mistake of his life.

You are sent on a mission to the woodlands to find and document the most mysterious of creatures.

A Step Into Darkness Episode One is an introduction to the series of three and is free to play.

name: Leylines
description:
As a powerful wizard, you start by ruling a small nation as you plot to take over the world! Rule over seven diverse races, from shapeshifting Theria, to spider-riding Dwarves, to the decadent Regency. Explore a vast fantasy world, expand by building more cities, battle the armies of rival wizards, and cast earth-shattering enchantments to ensure your victory. 
Leylines is a 4X game, a turn-based strategy game of exploration and conquest. The game features 150 different units and 80 different spells, customizable heroes and a map editor.

name: MGSLeisure1000
description: Leisure centre,bowling,golf,table tennis,bar,night club,music,disco,drinks,pool,arcades

name: Titanfall 2: Ultimate Edition
description:
The best way to jump into one of the most surprising shooters of 2016 is with the Titanfall 2 Ultimate Edition. Not only do you get access to all of the content included in the Digital Deluxe edition, this bundle also includes a Jump Start Pack which instantly unlocks all Titan and Pilot classes and arms you with the funds, Double XP tokens AND a custom warpaint skin for the R-201 Carbine all to get you up to speed on the Frontier.

Ultimate Edition includes Titanfall 2 base game, Deluxe Edition content (Scorch & Ion Prime Titans, Deluxe Edition Warpaint for 6 Titans, Deluxe Edition Camo for all Titans, Pilots & Weapons, Deluxe Edition Nose Arts for 6 Titans, Deluxe Edition Callsign), and Jump-Starter content (All Titans unlocked, all Pilot tacticals unlocked, 500 credits to unlock loadouts, cosmetics and gear, 10 2x XP tokens, the Underground R-201 Carbine Warpaint).

name: The Wolf's Bite
description: The Wolf's Bite is a one-versus-one choose-your-own-adventure game with an entrepreneur fairy tale twist. Inspired by stories such as "The Three Little Pigs" and "The Stinky Cheeseman and Other Fairly Stupid Tales", the game revolves around thwarting the other player while ensuring your business thrives. Be a Professional Chef or a Revengeful Saboteur, the competition is on.

name: Redeemer
description: REDEEMER is a Top-Down Action game where you will punch, hack and blast your way through enemies using fists, hammers, fire arms and even the environment.

name: Dino Frontier
description: Dino Frontier lets you build and manage a frontier settlement in a world where the wild west and Jurassic collide. You assume the role of Big Mayor overlooking your settlement in tabletop scale VR. You must carefully balance resources while growing your town. Wild dinosaurs roam the land acting as both dangerous foe and tantalizing asset.

name: Slime Rancher
description: Slime Rancher is a charming, first-person, sandbox experience. Play as Beatrix LeBeau: a plucky, young rancher who sets out for a life a thousand light years away from Earth on the 'Far, Far Range.' Each day will present new challenges and risky opportunities as you attempt to amass a great fortune in the business of slime ranching. Collect colorful slimes, grow crops, harvest resources, and explore the untamed wilds through the mastery of your all-purpose vacpack.

name: Aztez
description: In Aztez, you expand and maintain the Aztec empire through turn-based strategy, while managing violent outbreaks via real-time beat 'em up sequences. Every game is unique; different events will occur, different challenges will emerge, and different spoils will be taken each time you play. Spread, strengthen, subjugate!

name: The Long Dark
description: Welcome to The Long Dark, the innovative exploration-survival experience Wired magazine calls "the pinnacle of an entire genre". The game is a thoughtful, exploration-survival experience that challenges solo players to think for themselves as they explore an expansive frozen wilderness in the aftermath of a geomagnetic disaster. There are no zombies but only you, the cold, and all the threats Mother Nature can muster.

name: Dreadnought
description: Players take command of massive capital ships in the sky within the title’s core competitive and cooperative multiplayer suite and its episodic, single-player, story-driven campaign. Distinguished by a range of classes, subclasses, and varied progression paths, each warship is a force to be reckoned with, bristling with dynamic armaments and fully customizable to make your opponents crumble beneath the might of your bow.

name: The PTSD Mod
description:
The PTSD mod, It's weird. It's dumb, it's a guy who has an obsession with old punt and outdated memes.

PTSD mod let's you see the world from PTSD guy's eyes, experience memories, nightmares, memes and all sorts of stuff in this crazy world full of ptsd. Fight back the new punt leader and win back old punt!

name: Touhou Tenkarou: Frantically Forbidden Fruit
description:
Touhou Tenkarou ~ Frantically Forbidden Fruit is a fan-made Touhou Project script for the Touhou Danmakufu ph3 shooting game engine, made by Gore of Re.Phantasmagoria of Imagine Breaker.

The gameplay combines elements from Double Dealing Character and Legacy of Lunatic Kingdom, with a few significant differences. It also happens to feature elements similar to that of Wily Beast and Weakest Creature. Like LoLK, the game has two gameplay modes—Paradise and Legacy—and stages and boss fights are separated in chapters.

name: 1-Bit Return
description: 1-Bit Return is a Super Fun, Retro Isometric Platformer. Its Classic Style Features Retro PixelArt with Chiptune Sound Effects. Face 25 Arcade Challenges or Compete with the World in an Endless Adventure. Over 40 Randomised Worlds, 25 Challenges with Unlockable Characters and Much More.

name: Ikemen Vampire: Temptation in the Dark
description: The game takes place in late 19th century France where you, the player, have been transported to from the 21st century. You're stuck in a mansion full of some of the greatest historical figures of all time for a month until you can go back to your own era, but there's a catch - every single one of them is a vampire. There's only one rule for you during your stay, don't fall in love.

name: Blackout Z
description: Blackout Z is a top-down zombie shooter where you must kill as many endlessly-spawning zombies as you can while avoiding obstacles and finding resources, all as your flashlight's battery slowly runs out.

name: The Visible City
description: A game about the politics of lighting. Manage a Parisian district where the map disappears if revolutionaries destroy the streetlights.

name: Third Crypt
description: The last light lies below, in the Third Crypt...

name: Super Mario 64 1.5 Ztar Attack!
description:
Super Mario 64 1.5 Ztar Attack! is a Super Mario 64 ROM hack made by TheGael95 and released on July 31, 2017.

Containing 170 stars, it is one of the largest ROM hacks in terms of star count and the creator's biggest completed project. The hack contains all-new levels, custom graphics, objects, enemies, and music. The player begins in a grim-looking version of Peach's Castle. Most level entrances are still present, but they are explored in a different order and do not always go to equivalent areas in the original game.

The game's levels are also interconnected, with many levels containing entrances to other levels in addition to their regular entrance found in Peach's Castle.

name: 60 Seconds to Survive
description:
Are you ready to survive? Let’s check it now! Download our new 60 Seconds Survivor Escape game, gather vital objects in a really limited time and learn your readiness level! Collect necessary tools, weapons and supplies for your perfect survival and just have fun with this hidden object adventure underground game!

Do you know that everybody should have so-called emergency supplies for extreme situations? Of course, you do! So it’s time to start collecting tool for your own stuff in case of some catastrophe! Do your best and find all the required items at your large house, and remember: you have only 60 seconds! Hurry up grabbing such objects as water, batteries, documents, money, knife, first aid kit and some others!

Make haste, but be wise and careful: some items are useless (like a rubber duck, for example), so they can increase the weight of your survival bag! Check two game modes: free mode, where you should collect as much tools and supplies as it even possible in 60 seconds; and mission mode, where you should find all objects from your special list! Play 60 Seconds Survivor Escape game and have fun with this be ready app!

Earn points for successfully found supplies and unlock new skins for your character! Buy some boosters which can increase your time so you’ll have more chances to win this game! Enjoy colorful graphics and exciting atmosphere!

name: Earth Impact
description:
Can you bring an end to human history? Experience the terrifying power of asteroids in this unique and visually outstanding puzzle game!
Maximize the devastating damage by arranging your impacts smartly, as you take control over one of the greatest threats to life on Earth.
Based on scientific computation models and presented with breathtaking visuals, Earth Impact offers a spectacular and surprisingly challenging puzzling experience with a deeper background.

name: Sansar
description: Welcome to Sansar, an oasis for self-expression, exploration, and live events in a virtual world, where players shape the narrative as it unfolds. Join us on a quest, or create your own. C’mon, your world is waiting. Play on desktop or in VR.

name: Trundle
description: Trundle is a simplistic 3-D platformer where you must navigate a ball through a world of floating platforms.

name: Re:Stage! Prism Step
description: A Japanese rhythm game released on iOS and Android devices.

name: The Pirate: Plague of the Dead
description: Command the most fearsome pirates in an exciting Caribbean adventure! Plague of the Dead is a new installment of The Pirate series, featuring an open world without loading screens, dynamic day and night cycle and weather system, it offers each gamer an unforgettable experience.

name: Mage Guard: The Last Grimoire
description: Mage Guard is one of the world's first truly gesture based spell casting games for VR. Take on the role of a Guild Mage, tasked with guarding the Guild’s most powerful relic, "The Grimoire". Being the last of its kind, you will defend it against countless waves of enemies that are trying to obtain the precious relic.

name: VR Drum Studio
description: A drumming simulator for the HTC Vive.

name: Fisher Fans VR
description: A VR game about fish.

name: Gnome Light
description: Enter Gnorbert's dreamworld, and explore his inner most thoughts and fears. Memories of his life are throughout the game, hidden in puzzles and hidden treasures. What will you find?

name: Mage Guard
description: Mage Guard is one of the world's first truly gesture based spell casting games for VR. Take on the role of a Guild Mage, tasked with guarding the Guild’s most powerful relic, "The Grimoire".  Being the last of its kind, you will defend it against countless waves of enemies that are trying to obtain the precious relic. Use your Magic Powers to defeat those that oppose you. Level up and gain new spell abilities to aid you in intense spell casting combat.

name: Plexus
description: Plexus - an experimental 2d shooter with RPG elements, non-linear passage and a global map.

name: Watergate Xtreme
description: Watergate Xtreme is a frantic multiplayer extravaganza where you and your friends run around in a maze trying to control your guy and a remote control bomb at the same time.

name: Douche Bag
description:
The leprechaun Douсhe is of Irish descent. Like all the decent Irish leprechauns, they have their own wine cellar filled to the top with wine. 
Once sitting in front of the fireplace, slowly scoring into the tube a new tobacco, hears the thunder of breaking glass..

name: Diver: Sea Survival Simulator
description: This is a rich graphic based game where you can swim, hunt and gather as well… Abstain from the dangerous and aggressive animals, because if you go to close to us they’ll attack you! Look for the treasure chests nearby the polyps and collect them.Each level contains three treasure chests, but be careful, there are enemies, so try to avoid or defeat them!

name: Elly the Jelly
description:
Are you ready for the Jelly?
Get this awesome Party Game where you have to take your (former)friends out of the arena! Shoot pieces of yourself and use several items!

name: Rainbow Duck
description:
Turn the Duck upside down and defying the laws of gravity.

Rainbow Duck is an addictive game that requires focus, concentration and precise timing.

The intuitive one-tap controls allow you to discover the ideal path through all the challenging mazes.

Travel as far as you can and use the different power-ups to improve your highscore even more.

name: The Heiress
description:
In this adventure RPG you will have to decide how things will go for Alice.
Will she redeem her noble name and life? Or will she just abandon herself and become a sex tool? Will she become something evil, or remain a virgin to her Good End?

name: Memories of Home
description:
Brian Tomaskie awakens in the dead of night during a power outage. Before long, he finds that his life partner Sharon is missing.  
 
Play as Brian in this thrilling horror experience. Solve cunning puzzles all throughout what used to be a nice suburban home, but is now a dark, unrelenting nightmare.

name: Fidget Spinner Simulator
description: Whirl the fidget spinner, ride the hoverboard, enjoy the scenery. The whole trend theme of 2017 is in this game!

name: Gods of the Fallen Land
description:
Gods of the Fallen Land is an action-strategy game centered around base building and villager management. 
 
Take on the roll of a leader trying to rebuild humanity in a broken and dangerous world. Lead your followers into battle and make strategic decisions on what to develop and build to survive.

name: Morendar: Goblin Slayer
description: Goblins have tunneled into the catacombs beneath the castles of the land. The tribes are taking up residence and soon their numbers will overflow and pour into the surrounding towns. Defend your people and cleanse the filth now populating the depths below. The people need you, take up arms and fight your way through 10 massive levels filled with twists and turns.

name: Flux8
description:
As a sentient magnet, enslaved in a factory, you have two options: work or be terminated!
However, not all magnets are born to work. Some dream of freedom and choose to rebel.
There’s a whole wide world waiting just outside those factory doors… you must remain positive!

Play solo or grab a friend and jump into local co-op, working together to achieve the dream of freedom!

name: Genie
description: A series of mysterious murders jeopardize a detective's career, forcing him to make a difficult choice in his life. What your decision will be?

name: Valhall 2000
description: Challenge your friends and enemies to endless battles in Valhall 2000! This game lets you invite your foes to fight head to head in a 2D platformer style shooter. Pick up an AK47 or a Magic Wand and blast them all! You can also race to the finish in special climbing maps.

name: Creepy Races
description: Drive a vintage car down sinister roads while running pumpkins

name: Be Quiet!
description: You woke up in the middle of nowhere, the only thing you can see in the forest is a house. Solve various puzzles to get to the next rooms and accomplish objectives!

name: Roll Out
description:
Claims that the world is ending are as old as human history. This time they're real, and it's time to get out. It won't be easy though. 
 
Armed with a massive truck and a handful of supplies, you will guide your crew through the hazards and obstacles, trying to make it away from the calamity that's hot on your heels!

name: Destiny of a Wizard
description: You are the descendant of the long forgotten Blue Wizards, who sealed an evil presence many years ago. Now a new threat has emerged and plans to release this presence into the world again!

name: Bullet Party
description:
The party co-op shoot ’em up! 
Become the king of the night club alone or group your friends and shoot the party crashers down !

name: Jewel Venture
description: Jewel Venture is an exciting puzzle game that takes match-3 gameplay to new heights!

name: Leashed Soul: Survive & Rebuild Beydo Block World
description: Use your imagination! How grateful would you be if you got the biggest and best present you could dream of? When Beydo, the wooden doll comes to life he starts on a mission that spans through 50 different levels and different seasons to thank his gift by planting trees and creating life. Embark on an exciting puzzle adventure! Start your quest now!

name: Underworld Dungeon
description: Underworld Dungeon is a rogue-like action-adventure, in which you explore a ruined Greek dungeon hidden beneath the depths of the Underworld. As you dig deeper, ancient weapons and armor will be uncovered which you can combine to create more powerful gear.

name: The Legendary Blacksmith
description: Until now, it's always been unknown who crafts the magical weapons and armor for games. Now's your chance to use all of your wacky machines in your workshop to make weapons and armor to support the local village's troops in battle. Happy Crafting!

name: Sine Mora EX
description: Sine Mora EX is a side-scrolling shoot'em up that provides a unique challenge, where time is the ultimate factor. Mixing classic shooter sensibilities with contemporary presentation, Sine Mora is a gorgeous shoot'em up offering both a Story Mode that weaves an over-the-top tale and an Arcade Mode that provides deep, satisfying gameplay to challenge fans of the genre. The story mode can be also played in local co-op mode.

name: Vaer
description: The Light of the Sun is dying. Collect energy and return it to the sun to save the light. Made in under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 39.

name: Pixel Driver
description: Pixel Driver is a casual infinite driving game where you race in heavy traffic at high speeds. Crashing into cars is AWESOME since they actually break up into parts which let's you cause proper havoc!

name: HackOS
description:
hack into systems
move windows
recharge
deactivate nodes

name: A Moth Argent
description: Moths, dreams, mysteries, and darkness. A tiny game about the strange feeling of twilight and the moths that come out at night.

name: Something is Wrong
description: Sin descripción

name: Saturnalia
description: The celebration was forgotten, only the ritual remained. Stars alone are left to watch over this place, and in time their power too will fade.

name: Bear Football
description: Bear Football is a third person view bear football simulation game. The player controls teddy bear, score a goal by pushing it into the goal.

name: ConcPerfect 2017
description: ConcPerfect 2017 is a skill-based 3D platformer, with some puzzle elements. Overcome a variety of obstacles with the use of a propulsion-inducing blast (conc grenade) and careful maneuvering.

name: He Beat Her.
description:
..That’s what everyone thinks.
But you might find otherwise.. if you pick the right move.

You’re a lawyer, and your client is being accused of abuse. You only have 5 minutes until the verdict. You’re practically powerless. What will you do in those minutes? And can your actions make a difference? Find the truth. Serve justice.

name: Dumb Stone
description: Get rid off all your cards or you are the dumb stone. Play clever and be evil and let your opponents take the piled up cards!

name: Ziggurat 3D Chess
description: Ziggurat Three Dimensional Chess(TM), is a true three dimensional environment which combine the familiar movements of standard chess and exciting new moves never seen before. The rules of movement are easy to learn so beginners will be playing their first game in minutes. But the ultimate challenge of Ziggurat is greater than chess, because there are more pieces, more squares and more ways to move.

name: 8 Bit Fighters
description: This game combines legacy game elements such as side scrolling and 2D fighting games. Imagine you can perform all the 2D fighting game's stylish moves & combos on a classic side scrolling game. So download now and be the next 8-Bit fighters.

name: She is Sexaroid
description: She is Sexaroid is a VR H-game created by Damin's. The game centers around interacting with a girl in your room.

name: Keep It Together
description:
You are a coat full of rats living in a modern society, trying to pass as human. 
 
If you want to keep living the life you've come to appreciate, you best not let anyone discover your true identity! Just make sure you say the right things, don't upset anyone, and keep that coat held shut at all costs!

name: Super Dram World 2
description: Super Dram World 2 is a ROM hack of Super Mario World created by PangaeaPanga and is a sequel to Super Dram World. The ROM hack was dedicated to dram55, who is best known as being one of the top Kaizo Mario World speedrunners.

name: Melobeat
description: You can be a pianist with Melobeat!

name: Dragon Quest XI: Echoes of an Elusive Age
description:
The 3ds version of Dragon Quest 11.
This version has a 3D and 2D game mode that can be switched at locations in-game. Streetpass was also integrated into the game with a dungeon tied to it,

The 3D mode is similar to the PS4 version with the player traveling through 3D environments with monsters roaming around. They can attack, or be attacked, by the player to initiate battles.

The 2D mode uses pixelated sprites with a top-down view of the map. Battles are started through random encounters and use text to detail the results of battle under enemy sprites on the top screen with character stats shown on the bottom screen.

name: Angry shapes: Clash of geometry
description:
New genre of tower defense game here - Angry shapes: Clash of geometry! 
 
Place your turrets without any constraints on the battlefield in order to defeat the infinite flowing shapes! 
 
FEATURES 
☆ Temporary turrets ☆ 
In order to make the gameplay more addictive, every turret is temporary! 
☆ Skills(boosters) ☆ 
Increase the efficacy of a turret for a limited period of time! 
☆ Upgrades ☆ 
Increase the efficacy of a turret by upgrading it! 
☆ Achievements ☆ 
Complete achievements that will earn you rewards! 
☆ Secret codes ☆ 
Share codes with your friends to earn coins! 
 
Ready? Enter the battlefield, where angry shapes are waiting to clash your weapons! 
 
Note: Media access permission required to store&share images

name: The Adventurer: Episode 1 - Beginning of the End
description: Imagine if every time you fall asleep new adventure awaits you.

name: Super Blockbreak 3D
description: Super Blockbreak 3D is an action game where you use all your reactions and skills to bounce a ball around an arena breaking blocks as you go. Play to unlock all 30 levels or challenge yourself to get high scores.

name: Kama Bullet Heritage
description: You play for Kama the younger, the son of Kama Bullet. Your father was killed by the Magician Lezgin, you must find and take revenge on Lezgin, your awaits an incredible journey.

name: Fairyland: Manuscript
description:
The war between the Great Kingdom of Rukand and Fairyland still has not ended. 
A pupil of the Great Academy of Higher Magic enters the prohibited library to get access to powerful new spells.

name: Tupã
description: A small archer faces a wizard.

name: Dragon Quest XI: Echoes of an Elusive Age
description: Dragon Quest XI continues the gameplay of previous games in the series, in which players explore worlds and fight against various monsters, including the ability to explore high areas. Before entering battle, players can also toggle between the 3D and 2D graphical styles. The game features the series' traditional turn-based battle system.

name: Re;Lord 3: The Demon Lord of Groessen and The Final Witch
description:
This is the third and final episode in Escu:de’s Re;Lord series. Following the liberation of Herford and Cologne, Iris was captured by Adler’s Jäger unit. Since she possessed too much sensitive information to fall into enemy hands, including the concealment of his own magic and plans for a rebellion, Wilfried pursued them into Greiz instead of going after the third witch.

Greiz is a middle-sized city in the center of Groesen, and it is home to the capitol. However, there were no trains entering the castle town, and the hustle and bustle of the past was eerily missing. Surprisingly, it was also under the territory of the third witch. He was forced to fight on two fronts, as fate also seemed to conspire against him. Wilfried’s final battle has begun.

name: Five Nights with Mac Tonight 2
description:
Ever since the Mac Tonight commercials came in, McDonald's has been swarming with Customers for their new night hourly openings. One McDonald's made so much profit, they decided to step up their advertising and order a set of new animatronics to entertain the customers while they eat! That's where you come in.
The animatronics were recently shipped to a Storage Facility that McDonald's owns that keeps old belongings in there from the past moments. The animatronics are as of now being stored in there until the Staff at the McDonald's get the place set up properly before the Animatronics arrivals.
You're were hired to work in their Warehouse due to word that people have been breaking into the Warehouse, and stealing or even vandalising the property.
These animatronics were spent a fortune on, and McDonald's cannot afford having parts of them stolen or even destroyed. Don't let anyone get in.

name: Summer Pop
description: Sin descripción

name: Ruthless Smile
description: Ruthless Smile is the story of a girl named Ururu who was trying to save her friends from their cruel fate of becoming God-Bound. Explore an episodic story of humans and Gods and the cruel world they face.

name: Flappy Outside
description: Flappy Outside is a clone of the mobile game Flappy Bird based around the "Cash Me Outside" meme.

name: Genius Quiz LoL
description: Genius Quiz LoL is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the game League of Legends.

name: Beat Valkyrie Ixseal
description: Oudou Tsuguhiko is a student who believes he is the reincarnation of the Demon King, and is waiting for the time he can fully regain his powers. When that time comes, he is attacked by the valkyrie Ixseal, and further betrayed by his Demonic Chancellor Bezel, who steals six of his powers and leaves him only with lust. Ixseal learns that the Wargrim, Bezel's army, have isolated her from the heavens and her source of power, so she teams up with Tsuguhiko to fight back against them.

name: How to Live a Healthy Hentai Lifestyle!
description:
Gotou Hajime has enrolled in Penile University, majoring in perversion in order to study and deepen his understanding of the art and eventually carry out research on the subject.

Due to Hajime’s chosen field of study, he has registered to live with the Maezono family – a family whose mother is the legendary pervert that prevented World War 3 with her sexual diplomacy!

name: What's Up by Strawberry Studio
description:
What's Up is a fast card-flipping game in which you race to collect sets of birds first.
To set up, shuffle the thirty double-sided cards, then lay them out on the table in a grid. Each card features 1-3 birds in one of four colors - red, green, yellow, purple - with the reverse of the card having either the same number of birds in a different color or the same color of birds in a different number. Thus, each number+color combination appears five times in the deck.

name: Tekken 7: Eliza
description: Get the mysterious Eliza vampire playable character, coming from TEKKEN Revolution, and master her unique fighting style to win the fight against your friends and rivals.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2018: Mazda
description: Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 - MAZDA DLC includes two licensed Mazda cars: MAZDA RX-7 MAZDA Savanna RX-3 1978

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2018: Dodge
description: Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 - Dodge DLC includes two licensed Dodge cars: 1968 Dodge Charger 1970 Dodge Challenger R/T

name: Grand Dad
description:
Grand Dad is a fangame based off of the infamous 7 Grand Dad Chinese bootleg.

A platforming adventure through the world of bootleg games. Bootleg aliens are trying to take over Earth, and only the rebelling alien GRAND DAD can stop them! Use your club and other assorted weaponry to bring these fiends to justice and save the day!

Features original music by various chiptune artists, several levels, various references to classic and bootleg NES games and hardcore* axe-tossing, sling-shotting gameplay!

*(gameplay may not be that hardcore)

name: Brain Teaser: Memory Limit
description: A memory game where new rules get added each round, and you have to keep following them in order, while they get more numerous and harder every time.

name: Conjuntalia
description: Conjuntalia is an adventure, where you will have to save the kingdom of Talia while facing enemies and solving puzzles. The protagonist is a "Soul" in a false body,"Egos", who must return to his original body and restore peace to the kingdom before the day ends, otherwise the kingdom will be lost.

name: Tailwind
description:
This is a story of a very coward prince Elrick.
The King have sent him into the journey to solve this problem during the sea adventures.

name: NitroClash.io
description:
NitroClash.io is a multiplayer browser soccer IO game humbly inspired from Rocket League.
3vs3 games
challenging physics
play with mouse, keyboard or gamepad
in-game actions (goals, shots, assists, saves...) that rewards points
